Title: Blockchain in Supply Chain Management
Author: Mahmoud Rabea
Abstract: This paper examines the use of blockchain technology for transparency and efficiency in global supply chains.

Title: Deep Learning for Healthcare Applications
Author: Mahmoud Rabea
Keywords: Deep Learning; AI; Healthcare; Neural Networks
Abstract: This article explores the role of deep learning models in improving medical diagnosis and treatment planning. We discuss recent advancements, challenges, and future directions.

Title: Quantum Computing Basics
Author: Mahmoud Rabea
Abstract: An introduction to quantum computing principles, algorithms, and potential impact on cryptography and optimization.
